short_summary: This tender is to source Solid State Drives for support of eFP Latvia with the specific delivery location specified as 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec, Canada by the Department of National Defence with the bid deadline of April 11, 2024
description: This requirement is for the procurement of Solid State Drives (SSDs) to support PacStar CS Modules in support of eFP Latvia
full_summary:
================

### SSDs in Support of eFP Latvia

#### Tender Information

*   **Reference Number:** cb-270-20275045
*   **Solicitation Number:** W8486-249630
*   **Amendment Number:** 3
*   **Publication Date:** 20 March 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 11 April 2024, 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 30 April 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 6 May 2024
*   **Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

#### Supply Description

The Government of Canada is issuing an invitation to bid for the procurement of Solid State Drives (SSDs) to support PacStar CS Modules in support of eFP Latvia. The procurement category is Government of Canada (GC).

#### Product Code and Description

*   **Product Code:** 43201830
*   **Description:** Solid state drive SSD

#### Procurement Method and Bidding

*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Authority Name:** Greg Evans
*   **Contact Email:** Gregory.Evans@forces.gc.ca
*   **Contact Phone:** (343) 550-2143

#### Attachment

The tender notice and related documents can be found online at [HTTPS link to attachment] [PDF] and [HTTPS link to attachment] [PDF].

#### Tender Description

This requirement is for the procurement of Solid State Drives (SSDs) to support PacStar CS Modules in support of eFP Latvia. The delivery location is the 25 CFSD Montreal. The procurement category is Government of Canada (GC). The contact information for this tender can be found below.
